Abhinav Goel Doctoral student at Purdue University Building energy-efficient computer vision techniques for embedded devices.

About

I am an experienced Research Assistant working in the area of energy-efficient artificial intelligence, and computer vision. With a strong background in programming, I use my knowledge in computer engineering to find novel techniques to make computer vision techniques more deployable on edge devices.
